#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<cstring>

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        string s;
        cin>>s;

        int x=4;

        for(int i=4; i<=s.length()-5; i++)
            if(s[i]!='a' && s[i]!='e' && s[i]!='i' && s[i]!='o' && s[i]!='u')
            x++;

        cout<<x<<"/"<<s.length()<<endl;
    }
}
